620810.name: Fantasy Grounds - Brass Dragons (Token Pack)
620810.description:
Brass Dragons

A Graemation Token pack of hand drawn digital character tokens, made for adventures set around Brass Dragons, their humanoid species.
Add some flavour to your Encounters, NPCs or to be used as Characters with these 18 Other Brass Dragon tokens. These Tokens include a Brass Dragon, a variety armoured Dragon humanoids covering all the core fantasy armours, and even some dragon eggs.
Included in this Token Pack:
  • Brass-Bandedmail-Dragonborn
  • Brass-Barbarian-Dragonborn
  • Brass--Bard-Dragonborn
  • Brass-Breast-Plate-Dragonborn
  • Brass-Chainmail-Dragonborn
  • Brass--Chain-Shirt-Dragonborn
  • Brass-Druid-Dragonborn
  • Brass-Eggs
  • Brass-Egg-Shell
  • Brass-Hide-Dragonborn
  • Brass-Leather-Dragonborn
  • Brass-Monk-Dragonborn
  • Brass-Platemail-Dragonborn
  • Brass-Scalemail-Dragonborn
  • Brass-Splintmail-Dragonborn
  • Brass-Studded-Leather-Dragonborn
  • Brass-Wizard-Dragonborn
  • Dragon-Brass
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
